text: Hagi Saionima nemaniza vahe'mota huta, Babiloni vahe'mo'zama tagri'ma eme hazenkema nerami'za Jerusalemi kuma'ma eri havizama hu'nazankna hu'za ha' vahe'mo'za Babiloni mopafima nemaniza vahera zamagri'enena hazenke eme zamigahaze nehinke'za, Jerusalemi kumapima nemaniza vahe'mo'za hu'za, tagri'ma tahe'za korama eri tagi'naza zantera nona hu'za, Babiloni vahera korana zamahe'za eri tagigahaze hu'za hugahaze.
